Promise æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†è§£å†³ JavaScript ä¸­çš„å¼‚æ­¥ç¼–ç¨‹é—®é¢˜è€Œå¼•å…¥çš„ä¸€ç§æœºåˆ¶ã€‚

Promise è§£å†³äº†ä»€ä¹ˆé—®é¢˜ â€‹

åœ¨ JavaScript ä¸­ï¼Œè®¸å¤šæ“ä½œéƒ½æ˜¯å¼‚æ­¥çš„ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ç½‘ç»œè¯·æ±‚ã€æ–‡ä»¶è¯»å†™ã€å®šæ—¶å™¨ç­‰ã€‚åœ¨ä¼ ç»Ÿçš„å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°æ–¹å¼ä¸­ï¼Œå¤„ç†å¤šä¸ªå¼‚æ­¥æ“ä½œä¼šå¯¼è‡´ä»£ç åµŒå¥—å±‚çº§è¿‡æ·±ï¼Œå¯è¯»æ€§å·®ï¼Œç»´æŠ¤å›°éš¾ï¼Œè¢«ç§°ä¸ºâ€œå›è°ƒåœ°ç‹±â€ï¼ˆCallback Hellï¼‰ã€‚

ä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„ä¾‹å­æ¥è¯´æ˜å›è°ƒåœ°ç‹±çš„é—®é¢˜ã€‚å‡è®¾æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦æŒ‰é¡ºåºæ‰§è¡Œä¸‰ä¸ªå¼‚æ­¥æ“ä½œï¼šè·å–ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯ã€è·å–ç”¨æˆ·è®¢å•åˆ—è¡¨ã€è·å–è®¢å•è¯¦æƒ…ã€‚æ¯ä¸ªæ“ä½œéƒ½éœ€è¦é€šè¿‡å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°æ¥å¤„ç†ç»“æœã€‚

ä¸ºäº†è§£å†³è¿™ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼ŒPromise æä¾›äº†ä¸€ç§æ›´ä¼˜é›…ã€æ›´ç»“æ„åŒ–çš„æ–¹å¼æ¥å¤„ç†å¼‚æ­¥æ“ä½œã€‚å®ƒå°†å¼‚æ­¥æ“ä½œå°è£…æˆä¸€ä¸ª Promise å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡é“¾å¼è°ƒç”¨çš„æ–¹å¼å¤„ç†å¼‚æ­¥æ“ä½œçš„ç»“æœå’Œé”™è¯¯ã€‚Promise å¯¹è±¡æœ‰ä¸‰ç§çŠ¶æ€ï¼špendingï¼ˆè¿›è¡Œä¸­ï¼‰ã€fulfilledï¼ˆå·²æˆåŠŸï¼‰å’Œ rejectedï¼ˆå·²å¤±è´¥ï¼‰ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®å¼‚æ­¥æ“ä½œçš„ç»“æœæ¥æ”¹å˜çŠ¶æ€ã€‚Promise å¯¹è±¡çš„çŠ¶æ€ä¸€æ—¦æ”¹å˜ï¼Œå°±ä¸ä¼šå†å˜åŒ–ã€‚

ä½¿ç”¨ Promiseï¼Œå¯ä»¥å°†å¼‚æ­¥æ“ä½œçš„å¤„ç†é€»è¾‘ä»å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ä¸­æå–å‡ºæ¥ï¼Œä½¿ä»£ç æ›´åŠ æ¸…æ™°ã€æ˜“è¯»ã€‚åŒæ—¶ï¼ŒPromise è¿˜æä¾›äº†ä¸€äº›æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¦‚ .then()ã€.catch() å’Œ .finally()ï¼Œç”¨äºå¤„ç†å¼‚æ­¥æ“ä½œçš„ç»“æœå’Œé”™è¯¯ï¼Œä½¿ä»£ç æ›´åŠ å¯æ§ã€‚

Promise çš„åŸºæœ¬ç”¨æ³• â€‹

Promise æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ„é€ å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ new å…³é”®å­—æ¥åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ª Promise å¯¹è±¡ã€‚Promise æ„é€ å‡½æ•°æ¥æ”¶ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°ï¼Œè¯¥å‡½æ•°çš„ä¸¤ä¸ªå‚æ•°åˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯ resolve å’Œ rejectï¼Œå®ƒä»¬éƒ½æ˜¯å‡½æ•°ç±»å‹ã€‚resolve å‡½æ•°ç”¨äºå°† Promise å¯¹è±¡çš„çŠ¶æ€ä» pendingï¼ˆè¿›è¡Œä¸­ï¼‰å˜ä¸º fulfilledï¼ˆå·²æˆåŠŸï¼‰ï¼Œreject å‡½æ•°ç”¨äºå°† Promise å¯¹è±¡çš„çŠ¶æ€ä» pendingï¼ˆè¿›è¡Œä¸­ï¼‰å˜ä¸º rejectedï¼ˆå·²å¤±è´¥ï¼‰ã€‚

const promise = new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
  setTimeout(() => {
    let count = Math.random() * 10;
    if (count < 5) {
      // å½“éšæœºæ•°å°äº5ï¼Œpromiseå®Œæˆäº†æ‰§è¡Œ
      resolve(count);
    } else {
      reject("é”™è¯¯ï¼Œcount>5");
    }
    console.log("æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæˆ");
  }, 1000);
});

      // å½“éšæœºæ•°å°äº5ï¼Œpromiseå®Œæˆäº†æ‰§è¡Œ

    console.log("value3", value);

js
const promise1 = new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
  setTimeout(() => {
    resolve("Result 1");
  }, 2000);
});

const promise2 = new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
  setTimeout(() => {
    resolve("Result 2");
  }, 1500);
});

const promise3 = new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
  setTimeout(() => {
    resolve("Result 3");
  }, 1000);
});

Promise.all([promise1, promise2, promise3])
  .then((results) => {
    console.log(results); // ['Result 1', 'Result 2', 'Result 3']
    // å¤„ç†æ‰€æœ‰ Promise æˆåŠŸçŠ¶æ€çš„é€»è¾‘
  })
  .catch((error) => {
    console.error(error); // å¦‚æœä»»ä½•ä¸€ä¸ª Promise å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä¼šåœ¨è¿™é‡Œå¤„ç†é”™è¯¯
    // å¤„ç†ä»»ä½•ä¸€ä¸ª Promise å¤±è´¥çŠ¶æ€çš„é€»è¾‘
  });
const promise1 = new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
  setTimeout(() => {
    resolve("Result 1");
  }, 2000);

  setTimeout(() => {
    resolve("Result 2");
  }, 1500);
});

const promise3 = new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
  setTimeout(() => {
    resolve("Result 3");
  }, 1000);
});

Promise.all([promise1, promise2, promise3])
  .then((results) => {
    console.log(results); // ['Result 1', 'Result 2', 'Result 3']
    // å¤„ç†æ‰€æœ‰ Promise æˆåŠŸçŠ¶æ€çš„é€»è¾‘
  })

    console.error(error); // å¦‚æœä»»ä½•ä¸€ä¸ª Promise å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä¼šåœ¨è¿™é‡Œå¤„ç†é”™è¯¯

const promise1 = new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
  setTimeout(() => {
    resolve("Result 1");
  }, 2000);
});

const promise2 = new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
  setTimeout(() => {
    resolve("Result 2");
  }, 1500);
});

const promise3 = new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
  setTimeout(() => {
    resolve("Result 3");
  }, 1000);
});

Promise.race([promise1, promise2, promise3])
  .then((result) => {
    console.log(result); // 'Result 3'
    // å¤„ç†ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ª Promise æˆåŠŸçŠ¶æ€çš„é€»è¾‘
  })
  .catch((error) => {
    console.error(error); // å¦‚æœç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ª Promise å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä¼šåœ¨è¿™é‡Œå¤„ç†é”™è¯¯
    // å¤„ç†ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ª Promise å¤±è´¥çŠ¶æ€çš„é€»è¾‘
  });
const promise1 = new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
  setTimeout(() => {
    resolve("Result 1");
  }, 2000);
});

const promise2 = new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
  setTimeout(() => {
    resolve("Result 2");
  }, 1500);
});

const promise3 = new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
  setTimeout(() => {
    resolve("Result 3");
  }, 1000);
});

Promise.race([promise1, promise2, promise3])
  .then((result) => {
    console.log(result); // 'Result 3'
    // å¤„ç†ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ª Promise æˆåŠŸçŠ¶æ€çš„é€»è¾‘
  })
  .catch((error) => {
    console.error(error); // å¦‚æœç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ª Promise å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä¼šåœ¨è¿™é‡Œå¤„ç†é”™è¯¯
    // å¤„ç†ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ª Promise å¤±è´¥çŠ¶æ€çš„é€»è¾‘
  });

Promise.resolve(value) â€‹

åœ¨å®é™…å¼€å‘è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­ï¼Œæœ‰æ—¶éœ€è¦å°†ç°æœ‰å¯¹è±¡è½¬ä¸º Promise å¯¹è±¡ï¼ŒPromise.resolve æ–¹æ³•å°±èµ·åˆ°è¿™ä¸ªä½œç”¨

new Promise((resolve) => resolve("Hello World"));
// ç­‰ä»·äº
Promise.resolve("Hello World");
new Promise((resolve) => resolve("Hello World"));
// ç­‰ä»·äº
Promise.resolve("Hello World");

é™æ€æ–¹æ³• Promise.resolve(value) å¯ä»¥è®¤ä¸ºæ˜¯ new Promise() æ–¹æ³•çš„å¿«æ·æ–¹å¼ã€‚

åˆ›å»º Promise å¼‚æ­¥å‡½æ•° â€‹

js
const getShopDetailById = (id) => {
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    setTimeout(() => {
      // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿåç«¯è¯·æ±‚
      let count = Math.random() * 10;
      if (id && count < 5) {
        // å½“éšæœºæ•°å°äº5ï¼Œå‡è®¾åç«¯æ¥å£æ­£å¸¸è¿”å›æ•°æ®
        resolve({ code: 0, msg: "ok" });
      } else {
        reject("æ¥å£å¼‚å¸¸");
      }
    }, 1000);
  });
};

// å‡å¦‚å•†å“çš„ä¸»é”®idä¸ºï¼š1
getShopDetailById("1").then((data) => {
  console.log(data);
});
const getShopDetailById = (id) => {
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    setTimeout(() => {
      // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿåç«¯è¯·æ±‚
      let count = Math.random() * 10;
      if (id && count < 5) {
        // å½“éšæœºæ•°å°äº5ï¼Œå‡è®¾åç«¯æ¥å£æ­£å¸¸è¿”å›æ•°æ®
        resolve({ code: 0, msg: "ok" });
      } else {
        reject("æ¥å£å¼‚å¸¸");
      }
    }, 1000);
  });
};

// å‡å¦‚å•†å“çš„ä¸»é”®idä¸ºï¼š1

  console.log(data);
